author: Staff Reporter
text:
A section of East Tambaram residents were affected after they consumed drinking water that was reportedly contaminated.

Though residents of Motilal Nagar and Lakshmi Nagar claimed that over 10 people fell ill and were admitted at Tambaram Taluk Government Hospital in Chromepet and private hospitals, officials said only one had complained of a stomach disorder and returned home after treatment. However, residents said the water they received was grey in colour and had a foul smell. “Mosquito menace is also on the rise,” Rani, a resident, complained.

Officials said they had cleaned the water tank and conducted a medical camp to treat patients. They reassured residents that there no need to panic.
title: Residents allege contaminated water supply
